properties.Name: Interest
properties.Description:
Activities, Interests and Opinions are the foundation of Psychographics and Psychographic Segmentation.     

Activities, Interests and Opinions equate to 'lifestyle'.    

Activities, Interests and Opinions (AIO) are the basis for understanding consumer buying behavior as a function of their lifestyle.

Interests describe what a consumer 'is interested in', such as 'professional basketball', 'gardening' or 'investing'.

Ex:
Interest =  "Professional Basketball"
Interest Type = "Sports"

Interest =  "Gardening"
Interest Type = " Home Interests"

Interest =  "Investing"
Interest Type = "Finance"

Sales, marketing and advertising activities are often planned for or targeted at groups having or reporting specific interests.

Each organization will identify, define and track a specific set of AIOs to gather information about, define consumers and make decisions.

Columns.Name: InterestId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Interest.

Columns.Name: InterestTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Interest Type.

Properties.Description:
Activities, Interests and Opinions are the foundation of Psychographics and Psychographic Segmentation.     

Activities, Interests and Opinions equate to 'lifestyle'.    

Activities, Interests and Opinions (AIO) are the basis for understanding consumer buying behavior as a function of their lifestyle.

Interests describe what a consumer 'is interested in', such as 'professional basketball', 'gardening' or 'investing'.

Ex:
Interest =  "Professional Basketball"
Interest Type = "Sports"

Interest =  "Gardening"
Interest Type = " Home Interests"

Interest =  "Investing"
Interest Type = "Finance"

Sales, marketing and advertising activities are often planned for or targeted at groups having or reporting specific interests.

Each organization will identify, define and track a specific set of AIOs to gather information about, define consumers and make decisions.
